arts.ttl: Jadon Sancho sends pointed message to Man Utd after big impact on Chelsea debut
arts.sum: Chelsea signed Jadon Sancho on loan from Manchester United on transfer deadline day and the England international wasted little time showing his parent club what they're missing

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag pinches famous Cristiano Ronaldo quote as Marcus Rashford ends his Man United goal drought - after Portuguese star reignited feud with his former boss
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag felt it was appropriate to borrow a phrase used by Cristiano Ronaldo as Marcus Rashford ended his wait for a Premier League goal.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca aims subtle dig at Erik ten Hag as Jadon Sancho shines on his Chelsea debut after nightmare Man United spell
arts.sum: The winger had endured a torrid time at United after falling out with ten Hag and spent the second half of last season on loan at Borussia Dortmund.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca hails impact of Jadon Sancho after Chelseaâ€™s win at Bournemouth
arts.sum: Jadon Sancho marked his first Premier League appearance in 12 months with an assist on his Chelsea debut.

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag provides triple injury update after Man Utd's win at Southampton
arts.sum: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag provided injury updates on Matthijs de Ligt, Lisandro Martinez and Noussair Mazraoui after Saturday's 3-0 win at Southampton. There were hopes that Rasmus Hojlund, Luke Shaw and Mason Mount could make their returns from injury in that fixture, but Ten Hag suggested he will not risk the trio.

arts.ttl: DANNY MURPHY: Lisandro Martinez and Matthijs de Ligt may finally be the centre back partnership Erik ten Hag has been crying out for at Man United after strong showing at Southampton
arts.sum: DANNY MURPHY: There are encouraging signs Matthijs de Ligt and Lisandro Martinez could be the solid central defensive pairing Erik ten Hag has craved.

arts.ttl: Bournemouth 0-1 Chelsea: Jadon Sancho sets up Christopher Nkunku for 86th-minute winner on his Blues debut as Cherries are made to pay for Evanilson penalty miss
arts.sum: Chelsea goalkeeper Robert Sanchez pulled off a stunning penalty save but could not find a way past a resolute Bournemouth as the two sides played out a 0-0 draw.

arts.ttl: Adrien Rabiot's mother rules out transfer after Man Utd links: 'Not an option'
arts.sum: Adrien Rabiot is still no closer to finalising his future - months after leaving Juventus and it was claimed that Rabiot could perform a remarkable U-turn and return to the Serie A giants

arts.ttl: Erik ten Hag criticises Man United scheduling after Southampton wnin
arts.sum: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag hits out at his side's "unfair" schedule following Saturday's 3-0 win over Southampton.

arts.ttl: Man Utd fans hail Hannibal Mejbri after taunting Leeds fans with gesture
arts.sum: Hannibal Mejbri certainly enjoyed his day out in Leeds during Burnley's 1-0 win after getting one over on supporters who had mocked him in 2020 during a Man United FA Youth Cup game
